biotools.summary: The Salmonella In Silico Typing Resource (SISTR) is an open-source and freely available web application for rapid in silico typing and serovar prediction from Salmonella genome assemblies using cgMLST and O and H antigen gene searching.

bioschemas.name: SISTR
